name: avery_binder
description: For on-the-go organization, this Durable Binder is the perfect fit for briefcases, purses and backpacks. The binder design is stronger, lasts longer and resists tearing, while the DuraEdge feature makes the sides and top more pliable to resist splitting. Our deep texture film offers a smoother finish and features a linen pattern for high quality look and feel. Easily organize and secure loose papers with two interior pockets.
